effect_entries.effect: Given to the trainer’s rival in Jubilife City.  Contains two Town Maps, one of which is given to the trainer upon delivery.
effect_entries.short_effect: Given to the trainer’s rival in Jubilife City. Contains Town Maps.

flavor_text_entries.text: A parcel entrusted into your care. You are supposed to deliver it to your childhood friend who left Twinleaf Town.
